statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims
SELECT claim_id, estimated_loss FROM insurance_claims WHERE date_filed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT damaged_property FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Fire Damage'
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE estimated_loss > 5000 ORDER BY date_filed DESC
SELECT claim_id, damaged_property, estimated_loss FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Theft'
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car Accident' ORDER BY date_filed DESC
SELECT claim_id, damaged_property FROM insurance_claims WHERE estimated_loss > 5000
SELECT claim_id, damaged_property FROM insurance_claims WHERE date_filed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND claim_type = 'Fire Damage'
SELECT claim_id, estimated_loss FROM insurance_claims WHERE damaged_property LIKE '%House%' ORDER BY estimated_loss DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, damaged_property, estimated_loss FROM insurance_claims
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_description FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM home_properties WHERE property_value > 50000;
SELECT property_id, property_owner_name, property_insurance_company FROM home_properties ORDER BY property_owner_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_type, claim_description, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_date, claim_status, claim_description FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Denied';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description, claim_type, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status IN ('Pending','In Progress');
SELECT claim_type, claim_date, claim_status, claim_description, claim_id FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_type, claim_date, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car Accident' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM claimants WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT policy_holder, coverage_type FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, damage_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM claimants WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, date_filed, damage_type, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE date_filed >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, address FROM claimants WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT policy_number, policy_holder, start_date, end_date, coverage_type FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE damage_type LIKE '%collision%' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claimant_id, first_name, last_name, address, phone_number, email FROM claimants WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Companies;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_address='123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM Claim_Status WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT c.status_id, c.claim_id, cs.status FROM Claims AS c JOIN Claim_Status AS cs ON c.claim_id = cs.claim_id ORDER BY c.claim_id ASC;

SELECT pc.policyholder_name, c.claim_amount, cs.status FROM Policyholders AS pc JOIN Claims AS c ON pc.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id JOIN Claim_Status AS cs ON c.claim_id = cs.claim_id WHERE cs.status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, estimated_cost FROM Claims WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT insurer_name, phone_number FROM Insurers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT claim_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payment FROM Payments GROUP BY claim_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000
SELECT * FROM DamageTypes WHERE type = 'Fire'
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, address, phone_number FROM Policyholders WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT insurer_name, address FROM Insurers LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_id, claim_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01'
